entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
